channel.title: +1 Forward Movie Night - Rogue One and Impulse Drive
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/movie-night-rogue-one-and-impulse-drive
​Rach and Rich continue Movie Night, our series where we pair a movie and a PbtA RPG and talk about how you can watch the movie and improve your experience with the game. Our third pairing is *Star Wars: Rogue One* and *Impulse Drive.*
**Timecodes:** 02:02 - Spoiler-less *Rogue One* plot description 06:03 - *Impulse Drive* overview 12:38 - *Rogue One* Spoilery Chat!!! 17:09 - Playbook talk, where we assign playbooks (Archetypes) to significant movie characters 29:33 - Playable scenes from the movie 45:00 - Rach breaks down an NPC movie character with *Impulse Drive* mechanics
*Star Wars - Rogue One* can be found on Disney+.
You can purchase *Impulse Drive* here (aff): https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/279561/Impulse-Drive?affiliate_id=78493
A discussion on hacking Story Games to *Star Wars* from the Gauntlet forum: https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/t/playing-star-wars-in-story-game-systems/4449

item.title: +1 Forward Movie Night - Rogue One and Impulse Drive
item.dc:creator: @RichRogers
item.description:
@RichRogers wrote:

THE GAUNTLET

Movie Night - Rogue One and Impulse Drive

iTunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/+1-forward/id1110623840 RSS:  http://1forward.libsyn.com/rss

​Rach and Rich continue Movie Night, our series where we pair a movie and a PbtA RPG and talk about how you can watch the movie and improve your experience with the game. Our third pairing is Star Wars: Rogue One and Impulse Drive.

Timecodes:
02:02 - Spoiler-less Rogue One plot description
06:03 - Impulse Drive overview
12:38 - Rogue One Spoilery Chat!!!
17:09 - Playbook talk, where we assign playbooks (Archetypes) to significant movie characters
29:33 - Playable scenes from the movie
45:00 - Rach breaks down an NPC movie character with Impulse Drive mechanics

Star Wars - Rogue One can be found on Disney+.

You can purchase Impulse Drive here (aff):

drivethrurpg.com

Impulse Drive - Adrian Thoen | DriveThruRPG.com

Play a crew of misfits and scoundrels living a life of danger and adventure as they explore space and try to make their

A discussion on hacking Story Games to Star Wars from the Gauntlet forum:

Playing Star Wars in Story Game Systems RPG Chat
I was having a chat with Rich Rogers lately about his fabulous “SWS” (Star Wars Saturdays) series, which he has been doing with great aplomb and great success for several years now. He’s run over a dozen different systems, using a different game each time (but always reskinned as Star Wars), and I figure it’s time we picked his brains about what worked and what didn’t. Why? So we can have lots of fun doing the same, of course. (I may be personally running “Burned Over” as a Star Wars game on Su…

Read full topic
